constituent: ratio, mysterious, question mark, top hat, cocoon, sparkler, ten, needle
koohiiStory1: It´s quite mysterious how each sparkler gives of sparkles at a precise ratio of ten to one. Physicists have been studying this effect for decades, known as the Sparkler Effect, and using it to explain why stars look like sparklers in the night sky.
koohiiStory2: It's mysterious how there's always a ratio of ten sparklers to one package.
readingExamples: 率先 (そっせん), 引率 (いんそつ), 軽率 (けいそつ), 率いる (ひき.いる)
words: to lead, to spearhead (a group), to command (troops)
